name: homepage-cloner
description: Clone homepages using Firecrawl API with TypeScript React frontend

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server" "cd homepage-clone && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd homepage-clone && npm install && npm run build
scripts.azure:build: npm install && cd homepage-clone && npm install && npm run build
scripts.vercel-build: cd homepage-clone && npm install && npm run build
